entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023
